sentences.en: a slight irregularity in his heartbeat
sentences.cn: 他略微的心律不齐

sentences.en: A slight irregularity in pulse during sleep is not significant.
sentences.cn: 在睡眠时脉搏轻度不规则并不要紧.

sentences.en: An irregularity in the force or rhythm of the heartbeat.
sentences.cn: '心律'.''''.'失常'. ''不规则的心跳强度或节奏.

sentences.en: And his practice is apparent irregularity.
sentences.cn: 而他的做法是明显的违法.

sentences.en: He is suffering from irregularity.
sentences.cn: 他便秘.

sentences.en: Its complexity degree can be quantitatively evaluated using fractal dimension that can describe geometrical irregularity.
sentences.cn: 其复杂程度可以用描述几何不规则性的分维来定量评价。

sentences.en: Judges cannot permit irregularity in carrying out justice.
sentences.cn: 法官执法时不允许有不正当的行为.

sentences.en: Omit no harsh line , smooth away no displeasing irregularity.
sentences.cn: 不能省略任何刺眼的纹路, 不能掩饰任何讨厌的丑处.

sentences.en: PLIF imaging of turbulence flame displays clearly the irregularity of flame surface.
sentences.cn: 湍流火焰的PLIF图则清晰地显示出火焰面的不规则性.

sentences.en: Research indicates that GDL have characteristics of randomness, irregularity and self - similarity.
sentences.cn: 研究表明,扩散层具有随机性 、 无序性和自相似性等分形特性.

sentences.en: She never came without reporting some fresh instance of Wickham's extravagance or irregularity.
sentences.cn: 她每一次来的时候,都会讲些有关威克瀚姆豪华奢侈生活的新鲜事.

sentences.en: Ten (10) instances of irregularity shall be taken Default Action with respect to that Location during any 12 consecutive months.
sentences.cn: 连续12个月发生10次不规则行为构成违约，即连续12个月发生五次迟付款构成违约。

sentences.en: The irregularity of cellular phone distribution indicates the importance of the channel management too.
sentences.cn: 手机分销市场的不规范也反映了渠道管理的重要性.

sentences.en: The paint will cover any irregularity in the surface of the walls.
sentences.cn: 油漆会遮盖住墙壁上任何不平整的地方。

sentences.en: The topography of bullet surface wear was studied by using fractal theory. The irregularity and random distribution of its surface wear show the fractal characteristics.
sentences.cn: 应用分形理论对弹头磨损表面形貌进行了研究，研究表明，其表面磨损形貌的不规则和随机分布性具有分形特征。

sentences.en: There is an irregularity in your application.
sentences.cn: 你的申请书不齐全.

sentences.en: When collecting your baggage at the airport, remember to bring your Property Irregularity Report.
sentences.cn: 请您带好“不正常行李报告单”到机场取行李.

sentences.en: Will you please fill out the Property Irregularity Report?
sentences.cn: 您能填写一下行李不正常运输记录?

sentences.en: Working according to regulations is the best way to fight irregularity!
sentences.cn: 按规定作业是战胜“马虎”的最有效方法!

sentences.en: You need to complete the Property Irregularity Report.
sentences.cn: 您需要填写一下行李不正常运输记录.

words.tran_cn: 不规则的；无规律的；非正规的；不合法的
不规则物；不合规格的产品
不规则；无规律；[电子]不整齐

trans.tran_cn: 不规则，无规律，非正则，非正式，不整齐，不规则的事物
trans.tran_en: something that does not happen at regular intervals
